roleset.name: repeat back what someone has said, like a parrot

example.name: all args
example.text: Like if she 'll ask me where are my crayons where are my where are the crayons . Instead of saying I do n't know , I 'll say %hm well let 's look for them because she parrots back at me I do n't know .

example.name: arg1 as entity, not utterance
example.text: The children took their cues from her, parroted her.

roleset.note: PARROT-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on Call Home. No VNcls. (from parrot.01-v)
